      Method which is responsible for changing game-status to territory changing
      void endGame()
      Method which is responsible for printing the server 'end' status also makes this client status changed
      void game(int x, int y)
      Method which is responsible for invoking method which sends a coordinates of putted stone to the server, besides this method set listener thread to read server for two messages, where first is game-situation and the other one is turn-situation

      Method which is responsible for receiving turn from server

      Method that waits for client confirm of size of Drawing Board before invoking Connection with the Server

      Method which is responsiable for sending dead groups table from the client to the server

      Method which is responsible for sending territory table from a client to a server

      Method that is responisable for not allowing to accept dead table/territory table at the first move of player, so his enemy could mark his own dead groups/terrirtory

      void setEnd()
      Method which change game status to end of game, and invokes method to calculate each player's territory, also invokes method responsiable for'Game Over' message instead of 'Your Turn'/'Turn of Enemy'

      Method that sets current Play State of game

      Setting start to listener thread

      Method responsible for setting player turn after receiving from Server a message what turn it should be active/unactive also invokes method responsible for graphical output for received turn

      Repaints drawing board

      • setAccept_status

        public void setAccept_status(java.lang.String turn)
        Method that is responisable for not allowing to accept dead table/territory table at the first move of player, so his enemy could mark his own dead groups/terrirtory
        Parameters:
        turn - takes a turn of player, and change depending on it state if player can click accept button

        Parameters:
        turn -

      • recivefromOther

        public void recivefromOther()
        Method which allows receiving messages from Server such as, changing game status, pass, marked territory, dead stones etc... also invokes other methods responsible for changing game play status such as endGame(), invokes method responsible for visible graphic interface to continue next play stage

      • setEnd

        public void setEnd()
        Method which change game status to end of game, and invokes method to calculate each player's territory, also invokes method responsiable for'Game Over' message instead of 'Your Turn'/'Turn of Enemy'

      • informKO

        public void informKO()
        If KO situation is detected it prints it to the client

        public void informInvaildMove(int option)
        Prints to the client, that the move which he has done is incorrect
        Parameters:
        option - takes the option of incorrect move
